alert.note: Alert for Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:13PM CDT until June 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SHERMAN...DALLAM...NORTHWESTERN MOORE AND CENTRAL HARTLEY COUNTIES... At 513 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Texline to 6 miles northwest of Dalhart to 12 miles west of Hartley, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Stratford, Hartley, Cactus, Sunray, Ware and Conlen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
